newsitem.title: USA: AMRESCO completes deal to buy Idaho firm.
newsitem.headline: AMRESCO completes deal to buy Idaho firm.

text.p: AMRESCO Inc said Tuesday it completed a previously announced $42 million deal to acquire Commercial Lending Corp, a Boise, Idaho,-based finance company.
AMRESCO said it paid about 1.9 million of its common shares to shareholders of Commercial Lending and assumed certain debts of the company.
Additional shares may be paid through March 31, 2000, the value of which wil be based on earnings of Commercial Lending.
Commercial Lending will be renamed AMRESCO Commercial Lending Inc and become a unit of AMRESCO.
AMRESCO has offices nationwide and also operates in Canada and the United Kingdom/
